issues: Major semantic conflict: Asserted 'temperate woodland biome' conflicts with 'agricultural field' and 'farm soil' - woodland biomes are not typically agricultural
Land cover data shows savanna/woodland (30-60% tree cover) conflicts with asserted agricultural field designation
4.4km coordinate discrepancy between asserted coordinates and geocoded location name
Environmental triad incoherent: woodland biome → agricultural field → farm soil creates logical inconsistency
Asserted ecosystem fields (Agricultural land, Soil) conflict with woodland biome designation
Current vegetation 'Switchgrass' and fertilizer application support agricultural context but conflict with woodland biome
recommendations: Update env_broad_scale from 'temperate woodland biome' to 'agricultural biome' or 'temperate grassland biome' to match agricultural context
Verify coordinate accuracy - 4.4km discrepancy suggests potential data entry error
Consider updating ecosystem fields to be internally consistent - either all agricultural or all woodland
Review land cover classification - savanna designation may indicate mixed agricultural-natural landscape
Validate sample location with field records to resolve coordinate vs. location name discrepancy
Ensure environmental triad follows logical hierarchy: biome → local environment → immediate medium
